name: .TOTALSDB File Extension
summary: Learn about .TOTALSDB files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File created by Totals, a program used for making invoices; saves a database of client information, invoices, and reports; allows personal consultants and small business owners to track invoice information.

content: Totals allows users to edit report templates and print reports, which can be sent to clients for remittance of payment.
